Ingredients.1: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, at room temperature

Ingredients.3: 1 tablespoon Buffalo wing sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®), or to taste

Ingredients.5: 0.25 teaspoon minced garlic, or to taste

Ingredients.6: 0.5 (1 ounce) package dry ranch dressing mix

Directions.1: Stir cream cheese until smooth. Mix in chicken until well incorporated. Add Buffalo sauce, mayonnaise, garlic, and ranch dressing mix; mix well.

Directions.2: Scoop onto plastic wrap. Wrap and roll into a tight ball. Refrigerate for 8 hours, or overnight.
